question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding UNFCCC?
1) The primary goals of the UNFCCC were to stabilize greenhouse gas emissions.
2) India signed the agreement in June 1992.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change was adopted in 1992. The primary goals of the UNFCCC were to stabilize greenhouse gas emissions. India also signed the agreement in June 1992.
